masks-newgeneration-unofficial.callerQuote:
"Code Tinsel! One of Santa's prototype sleighs crashed into the mall food court! The pilot elf is trapped under a Cinnabon kiosk and the experimental anti-gravity candy canes are making everything float! We've got airborne pretzels and panicking shoppers!"

Requirements

  • Rescue the trapped elf pilot from the wreckage
  • Contain the floating debris before someone gets hurt
  • Keep civilians calmâ€”it's Christmas Eve!
